taxYear.description: The tax year of the Document (Billing period from â€“ billing period to), in the format YYYY-YY. For example, the tax year 2020 to 2021 is expressed as 2020-21.

documentId.description: DocumentID may contain SAP document number or Form Bundle Number for zero-amount documents. Must conform to the regular expression ^[0-9a-zA-Z]{1,30}$

formBundleNumber.description: The form bundle number designates a package of related transactions gathered together.

creditReason.description: Credit Reason gives the reason as to why there is a credit on the account.

documentDate.description: The date when the document for a particular tax group containing charges was created in the format YYYY-MM-DD.

documentText.description: Provides details about the tax group that the charge belongs to.

documentDueDate.description: The date the item must be received in the format YYYY-MM-DD.

documentDescription.description: The primary method to identify what type of document has been called.

originalAmount.description:
The original value of this transaction before payments, credits, or adjustments.
The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 to 2 decimal places.

outstandingAmount.description:
The amount remaining of this transaction after payments, credits, or adjustments.
The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 to 2 decimal places.

lastClearing.description: Details if the amount was previously modified.

lastClearingDate.description: The date the outstanding amount was last modified, in the format YYYY-MM-DD.

lastClearingReason.description: The reason for the change. For example, an interest charge was created.

lastClearedAmount.description: The amount the transaction was last modified by. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 to 2 decimal places.

isChargeEstimate.description: An indicator to represent that the charge is an estimate and not an actual charge. The value must be true or false.

isCodedOut.description: An indicator to represent that the charge has been sent for coding out.

paymentLot.description: A unique identifier for a credit that has been made direct to ETMP.

paymentLotItem.description: A unique ID that is used in combination with Payment Lot to refer to an individual payment.

effectiveDateOfPayment.description: The effective date of payment in the format YYYY-MM-DD.

latePaymentInterest.description: An object containing late payment interest details.

latePaymentInterestId.description: Late Payment Interest ID is the Charge Reference Number of all the monthly and final interest charges of the same parent charge.

accruingInterestAmount.description:
The total value of all the monthly interest charges and accruing (unposted) interest charges is grouped by Charge Reference level. 
The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 to 2 decimal places.

interestRate.description: The latest interest rate for late payments. The value must be between 0 and 99.99 to 2 decimal places.

interestStartDate.description: The date the interest charges started in the format YYYY-MM-DD.

interestEndDate.description: The date the interest charges ended in the format YYYY-MM-DD.

interestAmount.description:
The total value of all the monthly interest charges and final interest charges is grouped by Charge Reference level.
The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 to 2 decimal places.

interestDunningLockAmount.description:
Late payment interest amount where the  Interest is temporarily not being charged on (A lock has been put so the interest will not be charged to the customer). 
The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 to 2 decimal places.

interestOutstandingAmount.description:
TThe unpaid amount of Accruing Interest or Late Payment Interest. 
The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 to 2 decimal places.

amountCodedOut.description:
The amount from the total tax return charge that has been coded out. 
The value must be between -9999.99 and 2999.99 to 2 decimal places.

reducedCharge.description: Details if Charge has been reduced.

chargeType.description:
Document name of charge reduced. 
This will be the Charge type name of the original charge

documentNumber.description:
If Charge has been reduced, and credit arises, the document number to be shown. 
This will be the SAP Document number of this document

amendmentDate.description:
Amendment date of charge that has been reduced. 
This will be the date the charge was reduced/changed/reversed in the format YYYY-MM-DD.

taxYear.description:
Tax Year of Charge that has been reduced. 
This is the tax year on the original charge.
